qas.question: What did stations replace programming with?
What was the source of the live feeds?

context: All Mainland Chinese television stations (along with some stations in Hong Kong and expatriate communities) cancelled all regularly-scheduled programming, displayed their logo in grayscale, and replaced their cancelled programmes with <a0_0>live earthquake footage<a0_0/> from <a1_0>CCTV-1<a1_0/> for multiple days after the quake. Even pay television channels (such as Channel V) had their <a2_0>programmes suspended<a2_0/>.
